name: PicostoneSmartHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on Bedroom lights”
”Alexa, turn off cove lights”
”Alexa , set lamp brightness to 50%”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
description: using this skill user can turn the lights on and off of the entire room.

Prerequisites: 
It is necessary to have Picostone device installed at your place.
The user has to register using registration process.
Then he/she can use the same email id and password to link Alexa's account.

Using this skill user can do the following things:
1. To turn Bedroom lights on say - "Alexa, turn on Bedroom lights"
2. To turn Cove lights off say - "Alexa, turn off cove lights"
3. To set Lamp brightness 50% say - "Alexa , set lamp brightness to 50%"
